middle.json.sentence: She was {wi}lying{/wi} when she said she didn't break the vase.
I brush my {it}teeth{/it} twice a day.

expert.json.sentence: The sailors feared the {wi}cat-o'-nine-tails{/wi}, a whip used for punishment.
The pirate flag featured a {wi}death's-head{/wi} symbol.
Use abbreviations like {wi}e.g.{/wi} to provide examples in formal writing.
